short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replacing the word terror!sm with what it really is: delusionism

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We must stop calling terror!sts 'terror!sts'. It feeds their narrative, romanticizes their cause and achieves what they want. It is time we start calling them what they really are: delusionists. Let's strip them of their ability to frighten us, one word at a time.
